name: Lazy Fetch
description:
A game made in 3 hours for Trijam #128: The 3 hour game jam.

The jam theme is: Throw it to me

You took your dog to the park to play fetch but he's too lazy to move, so he found various way to play while not moving a paw!

To play use SPACE or CLICK the screen anywhere to throw the bone.

Music:
"Spinning Tavern" Composed by Jonathan Shaw (www.jshaw.co.uk)

SFX:
"RPG Sound Pack" by artisticdude
